markdownRemark.excerpt: Postgresql 9.0 has been released . With built in streaming replication and hot standby,  it means there is absolutely no reason to go MySQL anymore. Oh and if…
markdownRemark.html:
Postgresql 9.0 has been released .

With built in streaming replication and hot standby,  it means there is absolutely no reason to go MySQL anymore.

Oh and if you want to use a PHP based CMS with Postgresql, use Drupal which has the best support.
